mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_전문가권한기본 조회 (ExprtAuthrtMapper.getExprtAuthrt) */ SELECT mbr_no ,authrt_cd ,use_yn ,exprt_authrt_rmrk ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_EXPRT_AUTHRT" WHERE 1=1 AND mbr_no = #{mbrNo} AND authrt_cd = #{authrtCd}
